trans-unit.source: Contains and receives list-view item information needed to display a ToolTip for an item

trans-unit.source: Contains information about a notification message

target.mrk: Contains information about a notification message

trans-unit.source: Address of a string buffer that receives any additional text information.

seg-source.mrk: Address of a string buffer that receives any additional text information.

target.mrk: Address of a string buffer that receives any additional text information.

trans-unit.source: If Flags is zero, this member will contain the existing item text.

seg-source.mrk: If Flags is zero, this member will contain the existing item text.

target.mrk: If Flags is zero, this member will contain the existing item text.

trans-unit.source: In this case, you should append any additional text onto the end of this string.

seg-source.mrk: In this case, you should append any additional text onto the end of this string.

target.mrk: In this case, you should append any additional text onto the end of this string.

trans-unit.source: Size, in characters, of the buffer pointed to by Text.

seg-source.mrk: Size, in characters, of the buffer pointed to by Text.

target.mrk: Size, in characters, of the buffer pointed to by Text.

trans-unit.source: Although you should never assume that this buffer will be of any particular size, the $INFOTIPSIZE value can be used for design purposes

target.mrk: Although you should never assume that this buffer will be of any particular size, the $INFOTIPSIZE value can be used for design purposes

trans-unit.source: 0-based index of the item to which this structure refers.

seg-source.mrk: 0-based index of the item to which this structure refers.

target.mrk: 0-based index of the item to which this structure refers.

trans-unit.source: 1-based index of the subitem to which this structure refers.

target.mrk: 1-based index of the subitem to which this structure refers.

trans-unit.source: If this member is zero, the structure is referring to the item and not a subitem.

seg-source.mrk: If this member is zero, the structure is referring to the item and not a subitem.

target.mrk: If this member is zero, the structure is referring to the item and not a subitem.

trans-unit.source: This member is not currently used and will always be zero.
